title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Analysis and Application of Mobile-Based Language Education Training Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can compare and explain the characteristics and application scenarios of 13 educational training methods
Learners can select the optimal teaching method for language education purposes based on situational contexts
Learners can design interactive learning activities implementable in mobile environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
